001package io.cyborgcode.roa.db.service.fluent;
002
003import io.cyborgcode.roa.db.query.DbQuery;
004import io.cyborgcode.roa.db.query.QueryResponse;
005import io.cyborgcode.roa.db.service.DatabaseService;
006import io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.annotation.Ring;
007import io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.base.ClassLevelHook;
008import io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.chain.FluentService;
009import io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.retry.RetryCondition;
010import io.cyborgcode.roa.validator.core.Assertion;
011import io.cyborgcode.roa.validator.core.AssertionResult;
012import java.time.Duration;
013import java.util.List;
014import java.util.function.Consumer;
015import org.assertj.core.api.SoftAssertions;
016import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired;
017
018import static io.cyborgcode.roa.db.storage.StorageKeysDb.DB;
019
020/**
021 * Provides a fluent API for database interactions.
022 *
023 * <p>This class enables structured database query execution, validation, and retry logic
024 * using a fluent API approach, simplifying test interactions with databases.
025 *
026 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
027 */
028@Ring("DB")
029public class DatabaseServiceFluent extends FluentService implements ClassLevelHook {
030
031   private final DatabaseService databaseService;
032
033   /**
034    * Constructs a new {@code DatabaseServiceFluent} with the given database service.
035    *
036    * @param databaseService The service responsible for executing database queries.
037    */
038   @Autowired
039   public DatabaseServiceFluent(final DatabaseService databaseService) {
040      this.databaseService = databaseService;
041   }
042
043   /**
044    * Executes a database query and stores the response in the test storage.
045    *
046    * @param query The database query to execute.
047    * @return The current {@code DatabaseServiceFluent} instance for method chaining.
048    */
049   public DatabaseServiceFluent query(final DbQuery<?> query) {
050      final QueryResponse queryResponse = databaseService.query(query);
051      quest.getStorage().sub(DB).put(query.enumImpl(), queryResponse);
052      return this;
053   }
054
055   /**
056    * Executes a database query, extracts a value using JSONPath, and stores it in the test storage.
057    *
058    * @param query      The database query to execute.
059    * @param jsonPath   The JSONPath expression to extract data from the query result.
060    * @param resultType The expected type of the extracted value.
061    * @return The current {@code DatabaseServiceFluent} instance for method chaining.
062    */
063   public <T> DatabaseServiceFluent query(final DbQuery<?> query, final String jsonPath, final Class<T> resultType) {
064      final T queryResult = databaseService.query(query, jsonPath, resultType);
065      quest.getStorage().sub(DB).put(query.enumImpl(), queryResult);
066      return this;
067   }
068
069   /**
070    * Executes a database query and validates the response.
071    *
072    * @param query      The database query to execute.
073    * @param assertions The assertions to apply.
074    * @return The current {@code DatabaseServiceFluent} instance for method chaining.
075    */
076   public DatabaseServiceFluent queryAndValidate(final DbQuery<?> query, final Assertion... assertions) {
077      final QueryResponse queryResponse = databaseService.query(query);
078      quest.getStorage().sub(DB).put(query.enumImpl(), queryResponse);
079      return validate(queryResponse, assertions);
080   }
081
082   /**
083    * Validates a database query response against the specified assertions.
084    *
085    * @param queryResponse The query response to validate.
086    * @param assertions    The assertions to apply.
087    * @return The current {@code DatabaseServiceFluent} instance for method chaining.
088    */
089   public DatabaseServiceFluent validate(final QueryResponse queryResponse, final Assertion... assertions) {
090      final List<AssertionResult<Object>> assertionResults = databaseService.validate(queryResponse, assertions);
091      validation(assertionResults);
092      return this;
093   }
094
095   /**
096    * Performs validation with a custom assertion.
097    *
098    * @param assertion The assertion to execute.
099    * @return The current {@code DatabaseServiceFluent} instance for method chaining.
100    */
101   @Override
102   public DatabaseServiceFluent validate(final Runnable assertion) {
103      return (DatabaseServiceFluent) super.validate(assertion);
104   }
105
106   /**
107    * Performs validation with a consumer of {@link SoftAssertions}.
108    *
109    * @param assertion The assertion to execute.
110    * @return The current {@code DatabaseServiceFluent} instance for method chaining.
111    */
112   @Override
113   public DatabaseServiceFluent validate(final Consumer<SoftAssertions> assertion) {
114      return (DatabaseServiceFluent) super.validate(assertion);
115   }
116
117   /**
118    * Retries a database operation until the specified condition is met or the timeout expires.
119    *
120    * @param retryCondition The retry condition to evaluate.
121    * @param maxWait        The maximum duration to wait.
122    * @param retryInterval  The interval between retries.
123    * @param <T>            The type used in the retry condition.
124    * @return The current {@code DatabaseServiceFluent} instance for method chaining.
125    */
126   public <T> DatabaseServiceFluent retryUntil(final RetryCondition<T> retryCondition, final Duration maxWait,
127                                               final Duration retryInterval) {
128      return (DatabaseServiceFluent) super.retryUntil(retryCondition, maxWait, retryInterval, databaseService);
129   }
130
131   /**
132    * Retrieves the underlying database service.
133    *
134    * @return The {@code DatabaseService} instance.
135    */
136   protected DatabaseService getDatabaseService() {
137      return databaseService;
138   }
139
140}
